definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
lit. to exchange weapons of war for gifts of jade and silk (idiom)/fig. to turn hostility into friendship
pinyin: hua4 gan1 ge1 wei2 yu4 bo2

definition: cloth and silk/cotton and silk textiles
bamboo and silk writing materials (before paper)
cloth, silk, beans and grain/food and clothing/daily necessities
traditional money gift at a funeral

sentences.english: The one activity Palau is most famous for among adventurous travelers is diving.
sentences.chinese: 對喜愛冒險的遊客來說，帛琉最出名的活動就是潛水。

sentences.english: Palau is noteworthy for its amazing and scuba diving sights.
sentences.chinese: 帛琉以其令人讚歎的浮潛和潛水景點著稱。

sentences.english: Establish a beachhead at Peleliu Island on any difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 建立一個灘頭堡島在帛琉的任何困難。

sentences.english: In this case, the MP from Kapit.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，從加帛國會議員。

sentences.english: Inset this leave gold silk does the silks put into?
sentences.chinese: 將這塊假的鑲金絲帛放進去？

definition: cloth and silk/cotton and silk textiles
item made from woven silk or rayon
variant of 匹[pi3]/classifier for cloth: bolt
pearls and jades/jewels/clever remark/beautiful writing/gems of wisdom/genius/outstanding person
to estimate/to fine (archaic)/variant of 資|资[zi1]
